trustfund:
TF021813-BNPP-ENVIRONMENT : URGENT
            TRACKING AND REMOVAL OF HAZARDOUS MATERIAL,TF037259-HONDURAS - ENVIRONMENTAL DEVELOPMENT,TF036544-AFRICA REGION - FOREST RESOURCES,TF033702-HONDURAS - ENVIRONMENTAL
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF022712-PHRD-ENVIROMENTAL DEVELOPMENT
            PROJECT I,TF022787-PHRD-ENVIRONMENTAL DEVELOPMENT II,TF028720-IDF-HONDURAS STRENGTHENING CONAMA

abstracts.cdata!:
The Environmental Development Project
            will: (a) strengthen the capacity of government agencies in
            environmental and natural resource planning; policy, legal
            and regulatory framework development; interagency and
            intersector coordination; environmental monitoring; and
            enforcement of environmental laws and regulations; (b)
            assist the Ministry of the Environment (SEDA) and relevant
            sector agencies in the strengthening and implementation of a
            national system of environmental impact assessment; to
            develop the methodologies for the preparation and processing
            of environmental impact assessments and environmental audits
            in high priority sectors; and to engage nongovernmental
            organizations, communities and the private sector in the
            environmental assessment review process; and (c) develop the
            environmental management capacity of selected municipalities
            in a manner that will increase the involvement of grassroots
            organizations and individuals in the environmental affairs
            of their communities; and to finance, on a pilot basis,
            environmental projects at the municipal and community
            levels, and by small and micro-enterprises, through the
            Honduran Social Investment Fund.
